below.raw:
<script>
function toggleMenu() {
  y = document.querySelector("#header__hamburger");
  y.classList.toggle("click");
  var x = document.getElementById("naav");
  if (x.style.display === "block") {
    x.style.display = "none";
    x.classList.toggle("click");
  } else {
    x.style.display = "block";
    x.classList.toggle("click");
  }
}
    </script>
below.final:
<script>
function toggleMenu() {
  y = document.querySelector("#header__hamburger");
  y.classList.toggle("click");
  var x = document.getElementById("naav");
  if (x.style.display === "block") {
    x.style.display = "none";
    x.classList.toggle("click");
  } else {
    x.style.display = "block";
    x.classList.toggle("click");
  }
}
    </script>
